description:
Magic methods are a very powerful feature of Python and can open a whole
new door for you. However, with great power comes great responsibility.

In this talk we explore magic method's capabilities by first designing
new interfaces in a series of fun experiments. Secondly, we play with
creating undeletable objects and learn about the mighty Garbage
Collector in cPython and how a single magic method can overturn the fate
of the object. Lastly, we create a lazy Redis client to illustrate a
practical application of magic methods and learn about lazy loading.

Once you see what magic methods can bring to the table, the limit is
only your imagination!
title: Magic Method, on the wall, who, now, is the `__fairest__` one of all?
